segments.text: Did you bring your certificate for nursing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here is my Certificate of Nurse .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I learnt nursing through theory and practice for 3 years at Hunan Nursing School .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , pretty well . I have started learning English since primary school .
segments.speaker: S2
